org.openadaptor.auxil.connector.jdbc.writer
Class MapTableWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.openadaptor.auxil.connector.jdbc.writer.AbstractSQLWriter
      org.openadaptor.auxil.connector.jdbc.writer.AbstractMapWriter
          org.openadaptor.auxil.connector.jdbc.writer.MapTableWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISQLWriter
public class MapTableWriter
extends AbstractMapWriter

This writes IOrderedMap records to JDBC database tables.
It will match fields in incoming IOrderedMaps to columns in the configured database table, and write the values as rows in the output database table.
